About Me

Hello, I am a passionate lifelong learner. What does that mean to me personally? It means I am a curious person who enjoys figuring out how things work. When faced with a challenge or a ‘bug’ in a line of code, I see it as a learning opportunity. Right now, I don't know everything there is about web development but that's OK, I accept the challenge

My current stack of languages:

HTML - CSS/SASS - BOOTSTRAP - MATERIALIZE CSS - JAVASCRIPT

proejct one

Studying can get boring sometimes so I decided to make it fun with this quiz game. The questions focus on HTML JavaScript and CSS. The game keeps score but if you get one wrong answer you lose a point.
